name: Body Souffle
description: Made from Wintergreen Leaves, White Willow Tree Bark, Phyto-Powered Complex with Shea Butter and Apricot Oil.

name: Charcoal mask
description: This vegan buttery-rich purifying charcoal & chia face mask clears the way for all skin types

name: Ginger body cream
description: A whipped body cream with our signature, spicy Ginger aroma.

name: Ginger body scrub
description: Skin-scouring Dead Sea Salts and warming Ginger Zest cushioned in Sweet Almond Oils removes all traces of roughness to buff every bit of you.

name: Hand and body lotion
description: Our silky hand and body lotion with Hyaluronic Acid and Apricot Oil hydrates, improves barrier strength and imparts radiance—while it reveals softer, smoother skin over time

name: hand treatment
description: Self-hydrating Rose of Jericho plus skin-reviving Trehalose and Sea Haricots work hand-in-hand to help skin recover from dramatic dehydration

name: lip butter
description: lip balm—infused with 8 nourishing plant oils and butters—is a 2-in-1 treatment + overnight mask for soft, supple lips

name: Masking essentials
description: 2-in-1 mask exfoliates dead surface cells and gently deep cleans, also helps restore the look of clarity

name: On the spot
description: A soul-soothing, sensory treatment that helps you find your inner peace, on-the-spot.

name: recovery for dry skin
description: Skin-nourishing Shea and Cocoa Butters, help rapidly refresh, renew and replenish even the driest body skin.

name: skin scent
description: Ginger Essence is our signature ginger perfume and a fan-favorite since 2000.

name: Smoothing ginger body scrub
description: Smoothing Sugar gently buffs away dry skin and Leaves skin soft, refreshed, reinvigorated.
